messages.content: What was added in version 2.0.0 of unwdef-nodes-comfyui?

In version 2.0.0 of unwdef-nodes-comfyui, the following features were added: Stack version of the Randomize LoRAs node, Trigger words fields for the Randomize LoRAs nodes, Random Text from Multiline node, and Text Multiline With Variables node.
What issue was fixed in version 2.0.0 of unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
In version 2.0.0 of unwdef-nodes-comfyui, the issue of Randomize LoRAs outputting duplicated LoRAs if the user selected the same LoRA multiple times was fixed.
What was the significance of version 1.0.0 in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
Version 1.0.0 marked the initial launch of unwdef-nodes-comfyui and included the addition of the Randomize LoRAs node.
What is the purpose of the Stack version of the Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
The Stack version of the Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui allows for the randomization of LoRAs in a stacked manner.
How does the addition of Trigger words fields enhance the Randomize LoRAs nodes in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
The addition of Trigger words fields in unwdef-nodes-comfyui enhances the Randomize LoRAs nodes by allowing users to specify trigger words for the randomization process.
What functionality does the Random Text from Multiline node provide in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
The Random Text from Multiline node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui provides the functionality to randomly select text from a multiline input.
How does the Text Multiline With Variables node extend the functionality of unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
The Text Multiline With Variables node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui extends the functionality by allowing users to create multiline text with variables.
What is the purpose of the Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?

The Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui randomly loads LoRAs based on a predefined selection with randomized weights, allowing users to experiment with different artistic effects on their generated images.
How can you ensure reproducibility when using the Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
To ensure reproducibility when using the Randomize LoRAs node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui, you need to maintain the same seed and keep the same selected LoRAs.
What does the max_random configuration field in the Randomize LoRAs node of unwdef-nodes-comfyui do?
The max_random configuration field in the Randomize LoRAs node of unwdef-nodes-comfyui limits the maximum number of LoRAs to apply, even if you have selected up to 10.
What is the function of the Random Text from Multiline node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui?
The Random Text from Multiline node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui outputs one or multiple lines from a multiline text component.
How does the Text Multiline with Variables node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui work?
The Text Multiline with Variables node in unwdef-nodes-comfyui replaces instances of !var_x in your text with the contents of the var_x inputs.
How can you install unwdef-nodes-comfyui using the ComfyUI-Manager?
To install unwdef-nodes-comfyui using the ComfyUI-Manager, you need to search for 'unwdef' or 'unwdef-nodes' in the manager.
What steps are required to manually install unwdef-nodes-comfyui?

To manually install unwdef-nodes-comfyui, navigate to your ComfyUI/custom_nodes directory in the terminal, clone the repository using the provided git command, and restart ComfyUI to apply the changes.
